statements: SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT access_level, server_permissions FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_permissions FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level = 3 LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, access_level, server_permissions FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE server_permissions->>'admin' = 'true';
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level > 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, server_permissions FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level = 3 AND user_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT user_id, content_permissions FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level < 3 AND server_permissions->>'write' = 'true'
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE content_permissions->'documents'->>'read' = 'true'
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE JSON_LENGTH(server_permissions) > 0
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT server_name, player_count FROM game_servers ORDER BY player_count DESC;
SELECT server_id, server_location FROM game_servers WHERE server_location = 'US';
SELECT * FROM user_permissions INNER JOIN game_servers ON user_permissions.user_id = game_servers.server_id;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT server_name, player_count FROM game_servers WHERE player_count < 50 ORDER BY player_count ASC;
SELECT server_name, server_location FROM game_servers WHERE player_count BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY server_name;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions JOIN game_servers ON user_permissions.user_id = game_servers.player_count;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM permissions;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(up.permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(up.permission_id) > 2 ORDER BY num_permissions DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE game_server_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, count(*) FROM user_permissions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, server_name FROM users JOIN game_servers ON users.user_id = game_servers.server_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users;
SELECT server_id, server_name, server_location FROM game_servers ORDER BY server_location DESC;
SELECT user_id, game_server_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level='ADMIN';
SELECT user_id, game_server_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE game_server_id=3;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM content_access WHERE access_granted=true);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT username, email, access_level FROM users WHERE access_level = 3 ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE access_level > 1;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_description LIKE '%admin%';

SELECT u.username, COUNT(rp.permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id GROUP BY u.username;
